website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Adizero 8.0 is one of the lightest football cleats in the market today. According to owners, these low-top cleats from Adidas feel light and are easy to run in. These football cleats are also comfortable and provide excellent support when sprinting down the field. Skill players looking for a light, comfortable, and supportive cleat should definitely consider grabbing a pair of these low-tops from the Three Stripes.
pros: The Adidas Adizero 8.0 is an amazing football cleat, nearly all buyers exclaim
They really enjoy playing in these low-top cleats
These Adidas cleats are very comfortable, most players declare
According to a good number of reviewers, the Adizero 8.0 feels light and fast on the field
They claim that these low-top football cleats are perfect for skill players
Most testers are saying that the cleats are easy to wear
These football cleats are easy to break-in, several users report
The Adizero 8.0 fits perfectly, some wearers declare
A lot of buyers love the Adidas Adizero 8.0’s sleek silhouette
Some reviewers are reporting that these low-top cleats feel stable and have excellent heel lockdown
cons: A good number of players are griping that these low-top cleats from Adidas are a bit too narrow
According to one owner, the bottom part of his cleat broke off after just a few games
He’s disappointed that these cleats did not last the whole season

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight cleats
customer_reviews.text: My son got these fro Pop Warner football games and he loves them. Third pair he's had. He didn't want to get rid of his last pair even though they were a size and a half too small because he loves them so much. Slip-on sock design means there's no tongue adjustments. Low profile design and lightweight build make these perfect for speed play and low fatigue. Definitely worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: shawnzee

customer_reviews.title: Soccer cleat trying to be a football cleat.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike cleats from other companies these adidas have little to no protection on the toe box. Because the laces don’t come very far down into the toe box you can not tighten the shoe down past mid foot leaving a toe box that’s loose and non protective. This is a soccer cleat trying to be a football cleat and is not good for a skill position player. May be good for a kicker/punter but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: jason harshman

customer_reviews.title: “It is fire”...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! He said it was fire and that his lacrosse outfit has drip...I guess that’s a good thing...He also said that it’s comfortable and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: ERRN Mom

customer_reviews.title: light weight and solid build
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th pair of these we have bought over the seasons.My son is a HS QB and plays year round. These are well made and have good traction, light weight and fit great. they seem to last a long time but once they start to go, they go quick. We usually get a season and a little more out of them but we play in a lot of rain, which shortens the life of all shoes. We bought a shoe dryer this year and it has really helped with these. overall we will continue to get these.
customer_reviews.author: Felice Navidad

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleats for Lacrosse or Football!
customer_reviews.text: My son needed new cleats for lacrosse. Unfortunately our sports stores don't carry a very great selection of Lacrosse specific and because it is spring, the selection of football cleats was slim as well. He found these cleats online and of course Amazon came through with a great price and prompt delivery. The cleats are well made and fit like a sock, so there is no tongue that moves around. He wears a 10 1/2 in Nike and needed the same with Adidas. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MVaughan3

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Vapors and the shoe lace area broke after one game. Not the laces but the shoes portion that holds the laces. These adidas have way better reinforcement there. Also love the sock sleeve element!
customer_reviews.author: Ballpark

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: This was for great nephew. He says Adidas always fits perfectly. So, it is easier to buy online, than trekking all over the place hoping to find size 13s. These also look awesome on the field.
customer_reviews.author: Careena

customer_reviews.title: Good look and fit. Jury's out on performance.
customer_reviews.text: My son hasn't worn them on the field yet, but he is very happy with how they fit AND look!
customer_reviews.author: Dnorb

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 13 year old, he’s a size men’s 13, and they fit perfect. He said they are light weight and easy to maneuver in on the football field. Buying a black pair for practice..
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for short football season
customer_reviews.text: Bought two pairs If these this year so my son could have a practice pair and a game day pair. They didn’t wash up as well as past nikes or under armor ones. He Said they were comfortable and likes the shoe though. Noticed holes on the base or shoe to liner after first couple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived faster than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Cleats are exactly as expected. My son has worn them for several practices and 1 game and lives them so far.
customer_reviews.author: bashley

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: This is my son's second pair of the same pair of cleats. He loves them
customer_reviews.author: TZ in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, perfect fit. My son loves them. The item was received on time and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: The color are vibrant, and my son loves them. They were cheaper on Amazon then the Adidas site.
customer_reviews.author: T. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Tight cleats.
customer_reviews.text: I use this cleat to play soccer. It's good but it's so tight at the site where you tie the lace.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Great performance shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My son likes these shoes for highschool football and the shoe performed well!
customer_reviews.author: C Renbar

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: High schooler loved these. Easy to break in. No painful blisters and stiff soles. Comfortable and trendy. Buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Juliagulia

customer_reviews.title: good shoes, son has not slipped yet on hard field
customer_reviews.text: good shoes, son has not slipped yet on hard field
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Cleats I have Owned
customer_reviews.text: I tore up my last pear of cleats in a year but these are quite durable in my experience. They are good for stopping short and feel really light, as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jake O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Cleats
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. My son only worn these for a few weeks before school closed. He said they were good - I guess he can take them to college next fall!
customer_reviews.author: maryc6

customer_reviews.title: Missing insoles
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my son who plays football. They looked good, but the insoles were missing!!! Can’t wear cleats without insoles. Company offered and small discount, but I think they should have sent another pair or at least sent insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Harrell

customer_reviews.title: awesome cleats
customer_reviews.text: these came sooner then expected and they are exactly what we ordered. Perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Mccabe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Look great feel great! Bought them for my nephew for football. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Danae Foix

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed package
customer_reviews.text: Should already fell apart after one use . Very disappointed and dissatisfied. I don’t know if you guys sold me a fake adidas shoe that was just to get my money but I am not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: marlo lyons

customer_reviews.title: مُحقق الأهداف
customer_reviews.text: Nice and cool shoes, I'm going to try it out to play
customer_reviews.author: salman

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: This is my sons 3 pair of these. He plays football year around and wears them down but he loves the fit and performance of the shoe. Extremely light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Nieto

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: my son said the three stripe life writing inside the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Eric M Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit great! just enough ankle support. The are narrow fit though. Very happy, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Blanca A

customer_reviews.title: If you don't like a snug fit you shouldn't buy them
customer_reviews.text: My son said these are amazing they not only have soft padding on the heel they fit amazing they are snug as all get up he loves them I would recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these cleats. He has complained that some cleats feel heavy and hurt his ankle but these cleats are light on the feet and help him run faster. Very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Gil

customer_reviews.title: Cleat broke off.
customer_reviews.text: The first time my son used them to play football one of the cleats broke off. Not to happy with this considering I paid over 100 for them.
customer_reviews.author: jackie almendarez

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for!
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped earlier than expected which was great and the shoes fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: SJLO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love the way they feel! Adidas fits perfectly with size! I can cut perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Mr swift

customer_reviews.title: The shoes fit
customer_reviews.text: The cleats are amazing, but one small problem. For people that have wide feet then I suggest going up 2 sizes, but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: He loves them
customer_reviews.text: I can find my son easily on the field now!
customer_reviews.author: Crystals12

customer_reviews.title: Football
customer_reviews.text: Great football cleat. The fit is perfect. My son loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: These are my son’s favorite! So excited to find them and get them so quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Drip
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but I’ll have to break them in a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: CHristopher Singleton Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you think it’s soccer cleats
customer_reviews.text: I thought it meant like soccer cleats but it’s football.
customer_reviews.author: david villero

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect fit and arrived in a timely manner
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: They are light asf
customer_reviews.text: I liked how they came a couple days earlier then the actual date
customer_reviews.author: Eric Anaya

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color and how the shoe is made
customer_reviews.author: Corvant Parker

product_meta.title: adidas mens CEU04 Adizero 8.0
product_meta.description: Showcase your playmaking speed in these football cleats. Designed for easy on and off, they feature a textile upper with a sock-like construction for lightweight stability and lockdown as you create havoc at the line of scrimmage. The cleated outsole provides traction for quick cuts and pivots.
feature_bullets: Cleated synthetic outsole; Textile lining; Tongue and heel pulls
